item.title: Namecheap: A hive of spam and villainy
item.description: Anyone who has ever sent lots of emails knows how it’s hard to get them delivered without going into spam. There’s an entire industry of providers to pay for and lots of technologies to prove you’re domain is legitimate such as SPF and DMARC.
